Friends

  • class MEEditSignPostDialog

Detailed Description

A dialog for displaying info about sign post names of a certain connection.

An edit-dialog is available for editing the sign posts.

Definition at line 30 of file MESignPostInfoDialog.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

virtual MESignPostInfoDialog::~MESignPostInfoDialog (   )  [virtual]
 

Delete this dialog.

MESignPostInfoDialog::MESignPostInfoDialog (  OldConnection *  conn,
uint32  toNodeID,
MEMapArea *  mapArea
)  [private]
 

Constructor, private to make sure not called from outside.

Parameters:
conn The connection for which to display sign posts.
toNodeID The node TO which the connection leads to.
mapArea The map area where the connection is located.

Member Function Documentation

void MESignPostInfoDialog::closePressed (   )  [private]
 

Method that is called when the close-button is pressed.

This will close the sign post info dialog, and the edit-signpost-dialog if open.

virtual gint MESignPostInfoDialog::delete_event_impl (  GdkEventAny *  p0  )  [private, virtual]
 

Method taht is called when the window is destroyed.

The window should not be closed, only hidden.

void MESignPostInfoDialog::editSpPressed (   )  [private]
 

Method that is called when the edit-button is pressed.

This will open the edit-signpost-dialog with the selected sign post name for editing.

MESignPostInfoDialog* MESignPostInfoDialog::instance (  OldConnection *  conn,
uint32  toNodeID,
MEMapArea *  mapArea = NULL
)  [static]
 

Get the one and only instance of this class.

Parameters:
conn The connection for which to display sign posts.
toNodeID The node TO which the connection leads to.
mapArea The map area where the connection is located. If no map area is given, the sign posts can only be displayed, not edited.
Returns:
The one and only MESignPostInfoDialog.

void MESignPostInfoDialog::redrawSignPostNames (   )  [private]
 

Fill the sign post info dialog with the sign post names from the chosen connection.

Show the dialog.
